content.detailedDescription:
i have already reported on the first sighting. (2 orange lights playing leapfrog with each other)btw i have been able to confirm that sighting with two friends that also saw it from different areas around littleton. the same night i reported that i was putting my son to bed and looked out my window and saw two white lights very close to the horizon around tree-top level. one would blink off and the other would be on. they would alternate. the lights were small like a star and from my point of view looked to be about 4-6 inches apart. it then started moving away over the connecticut river and south towards the mountains.. as it got further away the lights got closer together and then were gone.This made no noise whatsoever.
     last night 11/21/2009 5:00pm i was having a cigarette with my coworkers in front of the store. one said "hey what's that?" when we looked up we saw what looked like a very bright white light that had a tail like a tadpole. then it was gone behind the building. we were looking to the south when we saw this. again no noise.
     and tonight i was on the porch with my boyfriend when again we saw a light coming into our vision very slowly. it looked kind of like two stars that were very very close together. they were not blinking or twinkling. it was just a light making no noise moving very slowly. we watched it for a while. it was to the north headed west to east. i would really like to know why there has been such an increase in activity. (i have been watching the skies since may of this year when i reported my first ufo.)
content.summary: 4 sightings in less than a week

content.detailedDescription: November 19, 2009 at about 6:40pm i steped out my front door and happened to look up and there they were.  it was a clear night and all the stars were visible.  up in the western sky, towards the everglades it appeared that some of "the stars" were flashing on and off.  when i realized they were all moving together heading north- i realized these were not stars.  they were flashing on and off sporatically- almost like camera flashes (that bright and that quickly).  i'd say there were over 15 of them flying together in close proximity.  it was difficult to count them since they were not visible to the naked eye when they were not flashing .  i was able to catch an outline of a couple of them- they seemed to be oval shaped and like a dark grey or gunmetal color.  they may have been round and just seemed oval from the my angle.  i quickly called my husband and the rest of my family to whitness the event.  we were all in awe.  we could see commercial planes in the area flying below them, which means they were pretty high up.  they were traveling faster than the planes were as well.  we wached them until they were out of view, we lost sight of them as they headed north.  it was really beautiful, they put on quite a show.  it looked like a cluster of glitter in the night sky.  they wanted to be seen.  for days i've been watching the news and looking through websites and i haven't found anything reports on this sighting- which i find strange.  anyone who would of been driving on tamiami trail or even in the everglades area would of seen it.  i hope others come forward as well.
content.summary: 15+ fleet of white/orange flashing ufo's flying in the western skies heading north.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north bound on s. vienna ave approaching moss mill rd, when i saw in the sky  a fireball of an oval shape that was red & orange with a tail that was of a lighter orange & red (meteorite?) it was following the direction of moss mill rd west bound. it was very dark out so you could not miss it. it was very cool! it also happened to be at the same location i had seen a ufo back in august of this year.
content.summary: Red & orange oval fireball with a tail

content.detailedDescription:
i filed my last report nov 18,2009. that same night i was tucking my son into bed and looked out his window, which overlooks the connecticut river and mnt. behind it, and saw two bright white lights that were alternating. they were spaced about 6in apart from my point of view. it seemed like they were just hovering over the trees. there was no sound. they then started to move very slowly towards the mountain. as it got further away the two lights went from a horizontal position to vertical before it went out of sight(or just turned off the lights) my son (7yrs old) was very excited to have seen his first ufo. 
   the next one i saw was last night (11/21/2009) i only saw it for a brief second while at work. my coworkers and i were outside of the shop that we work at on littleton's main st. our store is facing the connecticut river to the south. it was around 5:00pm when my friend says "hey what's that?" we look up and there is a very bright object streaking across the sky just above the building(it was only 1 story high) in front of us. it was very bright and it had a tail that squiggled like a tadpole. 
    the latest experience happened just now at 5:30pm. i was on the porch with my boyfriend when this star-like light came into our line of vision. very slowly it moved from west to east. we thought it was a plane but it didn't blink the lights on and off..And it did not have any red lights. the lights stayed constant until it was out of view..This last sighting makes the fourth i have seen in less than a week. i would be interested to know why there has been such an increase in activity..I will be keeping my camera on me so the next time i see one i can get some evidence.
content.summary: I have seen 3 different ufo's since i filed my last report about the glowing orange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was requested to report this sighting, by a local mufon field investigator (teresa turner).
11/18/09 20:05 - i was at my home, which is east of breckenridge.  i noticed what i thought was a commercial jet flying east to west in same flight path as an earlier plane but noticed the lights did not disappear (flash), like navigational lights. these lights pulsed in sequence. i got my binoculars and saw 4 amber (orange/white) colored lights in a row, with what appeared to be a smaller light on the bottom of the object near the leading end.  the smaller light would flash red, then white. 

as brightly lit as the object was, i still could not make out a fuselage, tail, or wings. if it were a commercial or military jet, i should seen an outline and would have heard the sound of jet engines, however, there was complete silence. if it had been a helicopter, i doubt i would have heard it(too high, too far away), and at that distance i would have barely seen it, if at all.  i ruled out jet aircraft and helicopter.  

the object appeared to be at an altitude of about 10,000 feet and perhaps 20 miles from my location  by my estimate, it was traveling in the vicinity of i-20, heading west.  when i first saw the object, it was in the direction of morgan mill, tx, which is to my se.  at it's closest, the object was probably slightly north of cisco, tx. i lost sight of object when it simply disappeared in the direction of baird, tx.  observation lasted approx. 2 minutes.

what this object was, i don't know.  for me, it remains 'unidentified'.

i have included a depiction of what i saw, along with a map showing flight path of object.
content.summary: 4 amber lights traveling at high speed, east to west

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5:40pm august 25,2009. i was on a 15 minute break at work.
as i was drinking my coffee i felt as something was coming toward me from
the right, i looked to my right but nothing and then i just looked up and there it was, it looked to be 80 to 100' long and about 15 to 20' in diameter. it seemed to be glideing not flying. no noise,no windows and no
wings, also no sign of any landing gear. i watched it until it went in a cloud. i thought wow what did i just see and looked back to the right to see where it come from and there it was a second one. i watched it follow 
the exact same path as the first one until it also disapeared into the
cloud. my first thought was some kind of weather balloons, but no these
were a piloted craft of some kind and following a flight path of some
sort. they were battle ship grey in color and as soon as they entered that
cloud thet were invisible. i thought maybe they forgot to turn on their
cloud machines.My thought the was i just saw two ufo's and who's going to
beleive me.
content.summary: I looked up and there they were, two of them about the size of two greyhound buses put together.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in forney tx,a small rural area located appromixately 20 miles outside of dallas, tx.  i was arriving home at appromimately 2:15 am. i noticed a large bright light in the sky when i turned on the street to go to my house, it was blocked by trees at the time so i thought it was a star. upon entering my driveway the light started to change shapes with several lights appearing on the bottom and sides of the object then changed back to a round bright white light. the object then started to move slightly up and down. it then started to fly. it flew directly over my house.  it was pretty high in the sky but very visible to the naked eye. it was huge shaped in the form of a triangle with green and either blue or purple horizonatal and vertical lights underneath it.  it also looked as if something was spinning underneath it.  i had my music up  in my car so i turned it down and heard a humming or buzzing noise from the object. i watched the object until i could no longer see it as it dissappeared in the sky. 

i've seen this light before, in the same area of the sky.  but thought it was just a beautiful bright star.  i was in such awe and disbelief as the object was moving over my house that i didn't even think to videorecord it with my camera phone. i even called one of the local news stations to inquire if anyone else had reported seeing an object. i am still in total belief at what i wittnessed this morning.
content.summary: First appeared as bright white light then changed shapes with several lights appearing on the sides and bottom of the object.

content.detailedDescription:
Since i found and have been reading on the mufon site for about 6 months, i have now decided to post this sighting���this happened somewhere around november 2003, since then at about this time of year i catch myself looking up more often especially at night looking for more ufo���s���i am uploading 2 drawing depictions with this posting���people may think that i am crazy���oh well, it did happen���i have only told a few people over the years about what i saw that night���i now carry a camera in my pocket at all times���crazy?  i don���t think i am but i do however want to catch them on video or pic���i don���t remember the exact date, i have slept since���many moons ago���so here is the best that i can do���

triangle flying about to the south at night���an average of ��� to ��� mile wide vehicle���no noise, no lights, gray or black in color flying at a very low altitude and moving at about 30 miles an hour is my estimation...It was moving over our town in san augustine texas on a clear and cool night while the high school football stadium lights were on and the football game was over. it was around 10 p.M., i was hearing no noise���just the faint sound of traffic from the streets about ��� mile away form my house is all that i heard���

i had been home for about an hour from what if i remember correctly was an emergency call since i was at the time a volunteer firefighter...My teenage son was already asleep, and we are the only two people there���i walked outside to have a beer and a smoke, went to the end of the carport and i was going to set my beer on the back of my car but instead i sat it on the concrete so it would not put a scratch on my car...I needed to straighten one of my sox���as i grabbed my beer and stood back up i looked to the north sky and saw this huge vehicle just over the high school football stadium, the lights from the stadium helped me to see this extremely large thing and let me tell you this vehicle was large, way too large���and i could not believe what i was seeing���i sat my beer down again and i ran into the house to grab a camera and could not find one in my bedroom so i decide to go back outside to watch this thing that was moving over our town, extremely slow���i have flown many times before and you have to go faster than this thing was so you won���t fall to the ground���on the way back out while i���m running through my house i took a second and opened my son���s bedroom door and yelled for him to get up, he sleeps really hard and he did not get up���this all happened within seconds���i kept running and went back outside to my driveway to watch this vehicle continue which is now over my house a little to the east and covering the whole town it seemed���i watched it continue on its southern path until i could no longer see it through the trees to the south of town���
content.summary: Triangle moving south~huge

content.detailedDescription: I took two photos of a potomac river scene and only noticed the ufo at a later time when viewing the photos in zoom. a second photo was taken seconds later and shows the ufo at a slightly different angle when zoomed. let me know if you would like additional information.
content.summary: I only noticed this ufo when i was looking at my photos about a week later.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:19pm on 21 nov 2009, i was in my back yard facing due east looking at orion and tuaras the bull star constalation, when a dark triangle craft with circular white lights on the bottom, passed from north to south as i guaged by the position of the north star, and it passed between orion and tuaras the bull...Southbound...It sighting lasted about eight seconds and made absolutly no noise..Their were aleast seven or eight lights on the bottom with one in the center of the craft. i watch jets go over and these white lights were different from comercial jet lights that go over at about the same altitude as the craft was. the triangle craft lights were flat white lights, no strobe or red or green nav lights as civilians aircraft have. the triangle craft did have three stiaght white lights on its back triangle portion (wing tips) for lack of better term,which were very faint. i would estimate the altitude as three to five thousand feet of the fly over.
content.summary: Dark triangle with circular white lights on bottom.

content.detailedDescription: My sister called me to come outside quickly to see the objects in the sky. by the urgency in her voice i knew something was not "normal". i had difficulty finding my keys to open my deadbolt lock and accidentally set off my alarm system.  the alarm company called and asked if i was okay and i told them yes but i still needed a police officer because of what i was seeing in the sky.  there were approx. 20 orange glowing objects moving from ne to sw over the area.  they seemed to come in "waves" and we saw about 5-6 waves of them.  a police officer arrived and stated he had seen them farther away and he stayed and watched several of the objects fly over with us.  none of the people who were watching had any idea of what they were.  we watched the objects for approx. 15-20 minutes before they completely left the area.  although the temperature was in the low 50's to mid 40's and i wasn't wearing a coat, i did not feel the cold.  i was awestuck at the site.  i could not take my eyes off of the objects.  even this morning, i can't get the images out of my mind.
content.summary: Approx. 100-200 orange glowing spheres moving ne to sw over lufkin, tx.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side smoking a cigarette facing east when at 1:29 am i noticed movement to my left so i turned in that direction and seen a group of white lights in a perfect "v" pattern moveing due west at a high rate of speed. there was no sound at all and the lights moved as if attached to a solid object. the sighting lasted only 3 to 5 seconds. i lost sight of them when they passed behind a nearby tree. the altitude it was at was close to where comercial airliners are normaly at. i would estimate that the object was 2-3 times the size of a 747 airliner but that is only if my altitude estimate is correct it could of been higher. i have no idea what it was. ive never seen anything like this before. the lights were a perfect formation. they moved like they were conected to a fixed object. you could see the stars in between the lights as it passed through the sky. its a perfectly clear night. there was one light that seemed to bounce between the other lights twords the front or point of the formation at kind of a medium speed. i know what planes look like especialy military aircraft and i have no idea what this was. ive never seen anything move that fast through the sky before at that altitude except for meteors.
content.summary: Multiple lights in v formation moving west

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in my yard.  i turned to look behind me and saw around 6 glowing orange sphere shaped objects traveling in the sky south to southwest toward me.  i immediately called my sister across the street telling her to get outside quickly.  i went into the street to get a clearer view.  there still appeared to be 6 or so of them. when my sister got outside, i was in the process of calling my son to come outside also.  it appeared that the 6 were about to pass by before i could get others outside to view them.  then, i saw more coming in the distance from the same direction as the first few.  my son and sister came out and witnessed them flying over as well.  it became a steady stream of these.  i called my mother who lives next to me to come out.  she came out and witnessed them.  i called the police to ask if anyone could tell me what these things were.  the dispatcher said "no, but i have an officer enroute".  the officer arrived and told me he was watching this stream of objects from another area of our city and could see them miles away.  he couldn't tell what they were either.  we called the local airport and were told they had nothing on these things.  as we watched them coming toward us, they were bright orange.  as they started to pass over and move away from us, the light would dim until it went out like the light may have been on one side and as it moved past there was no light on the back.  i spotlighted them, and got no reaction from them.  but, the spotlight still didn't show what the thing was other than the orange glowing light.  we watched the stream until the last one came over and disappeared.  we still don't have any idea what they were.  no one had a camera that could pick them up.  it was a crystal clear sky at the time.
content.summary: Stream of orange glowing spheres traveling south/southwest, low altitude, silent.  probably between 100 to 200 spheres

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside of our house in holland, bucks county,pa on the night of november 20th, 2009 at about 9:30 pm my wife and i observed a bright perfectly round yellow disc slowly crossing the sky from the eastern horzion traveling towards the western horzion. it made no sound while traveling across the sky and had no blinking lights. at first my wife and i thought it was an airplane but again with no noise or blinkimg lights quickly ruled that out. we both sit outside alot of the times of the day to know what an airplane sounds like. i looked at the space shuttle and the iss fly over times and they both flew over at 6pm in the northern horizon not over head at 9:30 pm. my wife and i were both very taken back and surprised that we were both able to see this sight.
content.summary: Disc crossed sky from east to west. non blinking, bright yellow. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Appeared in the sky around 7:20.  sdame object as i reported on the 10th, but lighting was different, this wasn't as bright this time but in the same spot in the sky, directly straight north. 

this time i was prepared with a camera.

object was not a reflection or light aberration of any kind it was very large and seemed to be thousands of feet up.  even though at times the sky was clear, it always seemed to be hazy or partially cloaked.

it went up really high around an hour 30 minutes, then came back down, then disappeared.
15 minutes later it appeared again for another 15 minutes then was gone.
content.summary: Bar shaped ufo hovering with detail and point light with amazing manuverability

content.detailedDescription: This was a hot night for activity in the air over nyc.. here we see a golden white orb flying gently across the mid-town sky heading west towards jersey.. the object is between my house and about 79th street. its near enough to see if its a helicopter or plane and you can clearly see its neither...  this is from 111709 v456
content.summary: Golden white orb/ufo flies across nyc sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Visiting badwater (lowest spot in usa) with family (two witnesses for this "event"). can hear 1/2 dozen military aircraft sounds over the telescope peak toward china lake. it captures my attention. i search and search toward the early afternoon soon to spot the aircraft. scanning slightly toward the south-west-west, but very high in the sky, i see what appears to be a blue-white-ish star near the middle of the day 2pm+ or - a few minutes. i'm staring, thinking how unlikely it would be to see a star during this time of day - thought briefly, "wow, a supernova???!!" i'd only heard about them, called my girlfriend over to see if she sees what i see. her character is to be very skeptical about most things. we watched it for about 5 minutes. then, it started moving toward the ne. slowly, very slowly, but it was discernible. so, we tracked it - from the weather station positioned at badwater in death valley. 

it still appeared blue-white, star-like - during daytime, high above death valley at its very lowest part, but more toward the west side of the dv. again, it was far higher than any known aircraft we're aware of (i was in usaf and have been in travel industry for 20 years) - we considered whether it was a satellite (and it certainly wasn't a geostationary), but they tend to move far faster based on our experiences - this was tracking slowly across the sky. again, at what must be at the edge of our atmosphere...It was just too plain high for anything we've witnessed before. then, it appeared to be "limping" along, stumbling...Almost like a tumbling satellite. we hope someone there at mufon will help us understand if there were satellites or test aircraft in the area - we were nearly smack dab half way between china lake (the northern part of it) us naval weapons testing area, and nellis + area 51, so we were thinking...Hmmmmmm.....

we continued to track it for 15 minutes, moving slowly...Tumbling. then, it stopped. did not appear to move position. for maybe another 5 minutes. it's brightness was mostly steady, except when it tended to appear to tumble. as it stopped, it dimmed a bit - this was now on the east side of death valley over nellis afb-nevada test site, but it did not lose altitude. again, maybe 5 minutes for the stop, then it began to move again. from there, it moved a bit further ne, losing its brightness until is vanished from our site - not like, "poof!", just that its brightness diminished into the blue of the sky. that's it - maybe 25 minutes of very intriguing sky watching. we continued to watch f16s/f15s tracing the death valley sky all afternoon. 

we've been unable to stop thinking about it since. we've never reported a ufo before, and we've been combing the sightings web sites to see if anyone else saw what we saw, but, we've not yet found any similar reports on/about this date/time. we'd love to hear back if there were any others who saw something similar.

we've no photos - it was far too high in the sky and simply would not have shown up.
content.summary: Day-time "star" appears at extremely high altitude ~60k', stays 5 mins, then starts tumbling sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were traveling east on highway h, when we topped over a hill and noticed an airplane-sized object traveling southward bound, in our direction. upon first glance, my cousin thought that it was a small prop plane that had run out of fuel and was getting ready to crash. i brought the car we were in, up to about 70 mph to meet with the object to get a better look at it as it passed overhead. as we got closer to it, we noticed that it did not have the same kind of light formation that regular airplanes have. then suddenly it came to a coplete stop above the road we were on as if it were waiting on us to get closer. i slammed on the brakes and the car slid to a stop almost directly under the object. my drivers side window of my car was down about 5 inches and i still could not hear any trace of sound coming from the craft. in absolute disbelief, we looked up at it only to make out the faint triangular shaped pattern, hidden by the intense glow coming from the three powerful lights that was on the underbelly of the craft. after having set motionless above us for what seemed to be about 3 to 4 minutes, the object moved slowly across the road continueing along its path until it got past the electrical lines on the side of the road. it then stopped again and commenced to turn on its side and lower itself down to the ground. my cousin urged me to take off and leave it, but i could not move out of curiousity. the object was so bright that it lit up the forest that was on the right hand side of the craft. stopping just 5 feet from the ground, the craft then took off at a high rate of speed and flew off out of sight. i have traveled this road many times since that night in both day and night and have never seen anything like it before or sinse. it has forever changed my life and there is never a moment that i do not think about it. off of what i saw that night, if that was one of our own government aircraft, there is no dought in my mind that we have already been to mars and back!
content.summary: Triangular shaped object stops suddenly above my car on small stretch of highway.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were traveling east on highway h, when we topped over a hill and noticed an airplane-sized object traveling southward bound, in our direction. upon first glance, my cousin thought that it was a small prop plane that had run out of fuel and was getting ready to crash. i brought the car we were in, up to about 70 mph to meet with the object to get a anything like it before or sinse. it has forever changed my life and there is never a moment that i do not think about it. off of what i saw that night, if that was one of our own government aircraft, there is no dought in my mind that we have already been to mars and back!
content.summary: Triangular shaped object stops suddenly above my car on small stretch of highway.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately thirty four years ago, i was 18 years old. we live at 3902 wewoka ave. i was sitting on the porch, and alot people were in the house watching a big boxing fight on tv, i think (ali & frazier). i saw these three (3) round disc slowly coming over the top of the houses, so i got off the porch and stood right in the middle of the street to see it closer, i was right under the disc. it was 3 of them in a v formation. the one i stood under was seem to be leading the other 2 disc. while was standing under the main disc, it had green,blue,yellow lights going around the bottom of it and it had a brite red light in front of it. there was not a sound at all, and there i was right under this disc. the o'conner mother,(family who live next door) had call the weather buero and they told her it was a good year blimp. but it was not. i know what i saw and what i did'nt hear.Than the main disc slowly hoover in south direction along with the other 2 disc (on each side of the main disc)and it speed off so quick, it was gone. the next day when my brothers went to school (pleasure ridge park), kids came to school and was talking about that they too had seen a ufo.


another time i was in sacramento, ca. in 1986, and i was sleep in my bed, when i heard a electral humming. all i remember was that the humming was calling me some how. the only thing i recall is that i was following the sound and i was moving in slow motion and i turn around and saw myself still lying in the bed sleep. but the sound is talking to me to come, so i keep walking toward the bedroom window and when i look out the window, there it was again a round disc. how do one go and get help to find out what happen to me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was (3) round disc shape, one disc that lead the other two, one on each side of the large disc.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to look out my living room window around 6:59 pm and noticed a single sphere of brilliant orange/yellow light in the sky behind a tree in the side yard. it caught my eye because i thought it was possibly a helicopter or plane, our home over looks the city to be exact.

the object moved swift at first but then slowed and seemed to stay in its position. all of a sudden another brilliant source of light caught my attention, it was another sphere arriving from the exact location of the first only it flared and was very bright once it appeared. it drifted up near the first object and then another appeared from the same location. 

i thought it was all i'd see until out in the distance another sphere. this one glowed even brighter it too followed the exact path as the other three. they seemed to be waiting for each other at times. for each would hover until the next appeared and then move higher into the sky. 

i was totally shocked to witness these objects continue to appear as they did. my parents were also shocked as they were witness to the event. even a neighbor stood in his lawn watching the spheres. we finally lost sight of the formation as they flew into heavy cloud cover.

after i saw them i continued to watch out my window hoping more would appear. i'd never seen anything like that so near a well lit city before.
content.summary: Four yellow orange spheres of bright light in formation.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from early christmas shopping with family, to the north of fort collins, co. i had one ���easy street��� micro brew beer with lunch hours ago. i was looking to the north. sky was overcast.  i saw what i can only state was the brightest ���flash��� of an object that i have ever seen.  the flash was quite large, as i estimate the distance of the object to be over 10 miles and the diameter of the flash was close to 100 meters. there was also a smaller flash that was just as bright within about 50 meters from the larger flash. the smaller flash was about one quarter the size of the larger one.  the object was to the north at about 35 degrees from the horizon. this was not an aircraft that had caught the last reflection of sunset, as i have seen this before and the energy (radiance) was much larger than anything the sun could produce, and the photopic spectral sensitivity, while in the 600 nm range, was multiples larger than anything that a reflected sunset would produce.  i can only guess that this must have been either a meteor coming into our atmosphere, which broke up into two pieces, or a manmade object coming into our atmosphere. there was no tail to indicate an object burning up in our upper atmosphere. otherwise this is an unknown. i am writing because i would like to know if anyone else had seen this object and can aid me in getting another point to plot from.  i am a member of mufon, and this is the first object i have ever seen that i cannot identify. thanks, bking
content.summary: Very large, bright flash, and smaller bright flash north in foot hills.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my computer almost ready to go to bed at about 11:30 pm when i heard what i thought was a really low flying plane nearby. i stopped for a moment and thought to myself that it was way too late to be hearing anything that large, low, and loud fly by. i went back to my email. about two minutes after the sound was gone, i heard the same sound again but louder . . . it was louder than any plane i have ever heard. now, i live in a very, very small new england town and i know that there are noise ordinances and laws and such and that there is no way anything is "allowed" to fly that low through the neighborhood even in the daytime. curious, i went outside thinking i was going to see a plane crashing to the ground nearby but instead this huge, dark, triangle shaped thing was low in the sky. it was at least 200 feet across each side. there were 1 - 2 bright, round, white lights at each corner. i think one or two of them may have been blinking. the scary part was the sound . . . it was soooo loud i was surprised that the whole town didn't wake up!! it was flying slowly by, between 500 - 1000 feet off of the ground. after about 2 minutes it was gone.
content.summary: Large, loud, low, dark triangle shape with white lights at each corner.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures from my back porch about 8 p.M. it was dark as it was late oct. - beginning of nov. i took several pics. the 2 i am sending you are the only ones that have something on them that i would like your opinion on. the first pic was taken because i saw a contrail coming toward the house. i thought it was odd to see one when it was dark and i was trying to get a pic of what was making it. when i looked at the pic on my computer this other image showed up. it's odd, and i didn't see it when i took the picture.
the second pic was also taken off my back porch when it was dark out. i had been getting some bad reception from my satelite on the roof and went out to see if something (planes) was causing it. i decided to take some pictures of the night sky, as i am always trying to get a pic of a ufo. i really don't know what these two images are, but maybe you can explain them to me.
also, during the early summer 2009 (april - may) off of the same back deck one morning, i looked out and saw a black triangular shape object moving just behind the top of the tree line the next street over. i didn't have my glasses on and ran to get them, but by the time i got back it was too far away for me to make out.
thanks for your time. i will wait to hear what you think the images are.
oh, and you will have to enlarge them somewhat in order to see the images.
content.summary: On back porch, dark, took pic of contrail and this object showed up when i downloaded pic

content.detailedDescription: You were here in ely, nevada the weekend of november 14, i was unable to attend your seminar because i was out of town.  i am a co-worker with shawn morrison at the mine here in ruth. we were working night shift and i run the dump, so where i am at it is very dark, one of the drivers pulled me over and told me what he had just seen, he was very excited about it. i told him i would keep my eye out. i guess an hour had passed by, and all of the sudden this orange like ball was there, it didn't go up or down or side to side, it sort of hovered there for a minute and then just disappeared, needless to say i was a little excited, called the truck driver on the radio and told him i had just seen it. i ended up seeing this same object about 3 different times that night. the only thing over that direction is a housing community known as the gap and ely state prison. so needless to say it was a little exciting.
content.summary: Orange oval shaped.

content.detailedDescription: When i was studying my bcs part one just front of my home at once i saw a flash light. that is all what i saw.
content.summary: My eyes was blinded

content.detailedDescription:
I am making this full report at the request of a mufon investigator, due to the recent discovery that a loss of the one from 2003 has occurred reference cms 2426.

this is the official report filed with the sheridan county sheriff's dept. on 7/11/03 and faxed to mufon hq

unidentified flying object report

on 7/10/03 at approximately 2300 hours, my wife [cms/tg/pid] went outside on our back deck to have a cigarette. while she was looking up into the south eastern sky, she noticed a small formation of three or four stars. one of the stars shot straight down and stopped.A series of lights came on and the object started moving in a northwest direction. she yelled for me to get out there and when i got outside i saw what i first believed to be an aircraft except the red and white and green lights were in a vertical formation, not horizontal. i now noticed that the speed of this object was relatively slow. i listened and heard a muffled sound much like a jet aircraft makes. the object got closer and i estimated it to be about 1000 feet in the air. it was just light enough to make out a silhouette. the object was longer from top to bottom than it was from front to back. it had depth to it and if i were to associate a shape to it i would say diamond shaped. the craft had two small red lights on the front and two small red lights on the rear about in the center of it. when it got closer i noticed several larger windows that projected light from inside the craft. there were three larger red and green lights running vertical along the front edge of the craft. i was trying to pay attention to as many details as i could and the one thing that stands out in my mind is that the speed was too slow and the muffled jet engine sound did not match and the sound was farther behind the craft. i also estimate that this craft is about 100 feet long and approximately 200 feet high. it was moving too slow for it's size. the sky was lighter in the west and i was hoping that when it got in a position that the sky was lighter i would be able to tell what it was. as the craft got to this position, i noticed the diamond shape of this craft and that it was not flat but did have some depth to it. we had been watching it for approximately 30 sec. i knew that it was right over my deputy's house so i ran inside and called him. i told him to go outside and look up because there was some sort of ufo over his house. my wife had run out to the front porch and i went outside and she told me that about the same time i said ufo that the craft stopped, the red lights went out, the jet engine sound stopped there was a soft white glow around the back of the craft, and the craft shot straight up and disappeared. the craft was approximately 6 to 10 miles away at this point. my deputy called back to tell me he saw nothing.

i have spent 14 years in the u.S. air force, all of them around jet aircraft. i cannot explain what we witnessed using any logical means. our law enforcement dispatch center is handled on a statewide basis. i called state radio and identified myself by my unit # 4610 and inquired if they had received any reports of strange aircraft or ufo reports. i was told no. they informed me that if they did they would notify me.

[cms/tg/pid]


* note: approximately on week after this event took place, 2 f-15's followed the same flight path as the ship we witnessed. this may have just been a coincidence.However we don't have f-15's flying overhead around mcclusky.

approximately two years after the sighting i was walking down an alley in bismarck nd and an air exchange unit came on up on a roof of a building. i immediately recognized the sound as the same sound that i had heard during the sighting back in 2003. this would explain the sound that i could not match with the thrust necessary to keep that ship in the air. 

thank you,
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Reference cms 2426

content.detailedDescription: at8:15 8:30 i was watching tv in my living room by one of the windows. in my easychair. i senced ,felt someone,something watching me.I looked to my right and there was an individual in a gray suit standing outside my window watching me. they were only there for a second or two if that long. they had to be over 7' tall. (i measured this morning).I had been discussing this feeling with someone just yeaterday, of sencing that someone was comming. de'-ja'-vu'.I was watching tv. i just had a sence that there was someone watching me and turned to look, and there they were. i knew it was not a person.But someone or something else entirely. the individual fled the instand it knew i had noticed it.So i only got a fleeting glempse of it. but i saw that it was dressed in gray and had a large head, (the eyes i am not sure of.) i was not affraid i felt calm,almost protected( again). as i have not been able to go out and watch the stars for nearly two weeks. i had been out earlier at about 7:30 8:00 pm.The sky was clear lots of stars cool and crisp no dust or smog.No traffic of any kind.So it could not have been a reflection of any kind. and not a reflection from my tv either.
content.summary: Watching tv when i senced someone something outside my window.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were in bed, and i had awakened but she was sleeping.  we had a 6x4 picture window in our bedroom, and i was lying on my side looking at the low-lying fog, or clouds from the mississippi river.
    the wind was blowing south-westerly, just enough to move the fog, and the city lights were making all this visable.  our house was in a very highly populated area of town.  i just happened to notice something moving very slowly, in the opposite direction beneath the clouds. thats why it caught my eye.  the clouds or fog was very low, and this craft was below the clouds. i'd judge it to have been maybe 500 feet off the ground.
    it had no lights showing, and it's speed had to have been no more that 15 or 20 mph.  once i saw it, i became fully awake and aware.  it was awesome, in the truest sense of the word.  it was huge, and there was no sound.  it actually was more of a bat-wing shape, than a triangle, although it was triangular.  what was so spectacular, was the size of the thing, and how slow it was moving, and it just defied everything i knew about gravity, aircraft, and my whole personal version of reality.   
    i awakened my girlfriend, and pointed it out to her, and she tried to see it for a minute, and with me describing exactly where it was, and how it looked, she never did see it.  that tells you that it wasn't as easy to see, as i thought it was.  its just mind-boggling, honestly; so big, and so slow, and so quiet, but seeing it changed my life.
   new orleans was right accross the river from where we were, and i remember thinking, if it didn't gain some altitude, its going to hit some buildings over there; and it was headed right for downtown new orleans.
    i said i saw it for four minutes, but it might have been seven or eight.  it took a long time to pass from view of my picture-window.  but once i saw it, i never took my eyes off it, until it was out of view.
it was at least 500 ft. from tip to tip, and nose to rear, at least 3, or 4 hundred.  it never altered speed nor changed course, as long as i saw it.  
    the, perhaps most amazing thing about this, is that in a big city like new orleans, apparently no one but me even saw the ship. also, i wasn't drugging, or drinking, and i do not hallucinate, or make up stories; i know what i saw, and i do wish i knew what it was.
content.summary: I watched a huge craft cross gretna, in plain sight.

content.detailedDescription: Driving back into naples from marco island before getting on the bridge i noticied a large star and thought to myself that is was very large. the star stayed stationary so i thought nothing of it.  then all of a sudden it got bigger in size and very bright. so much so that i thought that no star could do that.  then it dimmed to where it almost disappeared. this is now all occuring as i am still driving and going over the bridge and continuing on to naples.  as i am looking at this getting brighter and dimmer it then all of a sudden after not moving it started to move to the right looking like one light then after serval seconds of moving to the right with one light it then started blinking with several lights.  this absolutly was not a plane or a heli because it was stationary for so long and was getting brighter, larger then dimmer then it turned into something else.
content.summary: Star like then into something else.
